pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, July 30, 2017:

Calgary, Alberta

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Calgary via the CP Canada 150 Train and will deliver remarks.

South Parking Lot
Anderson C-Train station â€Ž

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
